intro: Latouria spectabilis, commonly known as the showy latouria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from pink to purple. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are lance-shaped and often have a hairy texture, contributing to its ornamental appeal. Latouria spectabilis is valued in horticulture for its vibrant blooms and adaptability to various garden conditions.
